W) Methanol is more stable than methane X) Methanol is less stable than methane Y) Because both are composed of the same atoms, they are equally stable Z) Their stabilities cannot be compared with standard enthalpy [EN-thul-pee] changes
answer:
Z) THEIR STABILITIES CANNOT BE COMPARED WITH STANDARD ENTHALPY
CHANGES

answer: X) CARBON AT THE 2 POSITION ON ACETONE
